mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date, category_no ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRODUCT_PROD_NO.NEXTVAL , #{prodName}, #{prodDetail}, #{manuDate}, #{price}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE , #{category.categoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no , p.prod_name , p.prod_detail , p.manufacture_day , p.price , p.image_file , p.reg_date, TRIM(t.tran_status_code) tran_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no = #{prodNo}
